post.text: My childcare plan allows for every family in America to deduct childcare expenses from their income taxes -- MORE money in your pockets, MORE freedom to make the decisions that suit YOUR family's needs. AMERICA First means FAMILIES First!

comment.author: Lauren
comment.text: Would the deduction apply to fica as well (the payroll tax everyone automatically pays)? Or just on income tax? If it's just income tax it won't help a chunk of the people that need it, but if it applies to fica that would help everyone that works that has kids.

replies.author: Kaitlyn
replies.text: Trump will raise min wage 15.00an hour

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: I think he only supports up to 10... http://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2016/jul/26/donald-trump-calls-10-minimum-wage/
